column6: A brand new era for the Uncanny X-Men begins here in a story that won't just affect earth, but will rock the foundations of the entire galaxy! Vulcan is out for revenge and has his sites set on the Shi'Ar Empire!
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | colorist:Frank D'Armata | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Danny K. Miki | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
